Posts.EditableText:
I consistently get 2 errors upon startup: "Error 457 - This key is already associated with an element of this collection in Utility.GetFontsList", which may or may not be related to my font pulldown list cutting off at "G" (I have a large collection of fonts which I imagine might be related to this).

also "Error 91 - Object variable orWith block variable not set in frmMain.tmrAutoSave_Timer".  I am able to click through and start the app successfully otherwise.

EDIT: Error 91 only occurs on my 4.1.1 installation.  457 occurs on 4.1.1 and 4.1.2
Posts.HTML:
I consistently get 2 errors upon startup: "Error 457 - This key is already associated with an element of this collection in Utility.GetFontsList", which may or may not be related to my font pulldown list cutting off at "G" (I have a large collection of fonts which I imagine might be related to this).

also "Error 91 - Object variable orWith block variable not set in frmMain.tmrAutoSave_Timer". I am able to click through and start the app successfully otherwise.

EDIT: Error 91 only occurs on my 4.1.1 installation. 457 occurs on 4.1.1 and 4.1.2
